name: Big Evil Cube
description:
In the future, humanity has come under attack from a hostile enemy: a sentient, metal cube from a race of other sentient, metal shapes. War has raged on for at least a week, and now humanity has turned the tide on the shapes: we are ready for an invasion of their home-world, ready to erase their kind from existence. Permanently.

Big Evil Cube is a first-person action-adventure game that was being developed during 2016. In this parody of modern military storylines, you will travel deep into enemy lines on a secret and vital mission to assassinate the leader of the shapes: the sickeningly evil dodecahedron.

Development is currently on hold due to other life commitments, but may be returned to some day.
